articles.title: Doomed European satellite to crash on Earth in six days, but nobody knows where - WION
articles.description:
The European Space Agency has decided to crash a failed satellite, known as the European Remote Sensing 2 (ERS-2) satellite, back on Earth. However, the scientists are clueless about where exactly the satellite will fall. 
In April 1995, the satellite was lau…

articles.author: Tim Hepher
articles.title: Airbus plans special dividend, takes new space charge - Reuters
articles.description: Europe's Airbus unveiled a special dividend on Thursday after posting higher 2023 results, buoyed by resurgent demand for jetliners and despite a fresh charge of 200 million euros ($215 million) at its troubled Space business.
